overview:
As the Managing Director of Unify² Asia Pacific based in Singapore, Tit-Meng Ang (‘Tit-Meng’) oversees all aspects of Unify2 Asia Pacific business including Sales (products, solutions and services), Customer Experience, Delivery, and building out a talent pool of trusted advisors (UC architects) for our enterprise customers.

(Unify²s Asia Pacific business region covers Japan, Greater China Region, South East Asia, Indian subcontinent as well as Australia & New Zealand.)

Tit-Meng brings over 23 years of experience in Enterprise Solutions Sales, especially in the Asia-Pacific enterprise ecosystem from his 13.5 years at Microsoft Asia-Pacific.

Tit-Meng was previously the EPG Director for Microsoft Malaysia, the EPG Director for Microsoft APAC (based in Hong Kong, and responsible for $500M in enterprise software revenue from the MS APAC/GCR regions), General Manager for Microsoft Enterprise Partnerships for China (based in Beijing), and most recently drove the strategic alliance between Microsoft and Lenovo, out of Singapore.

Prior to Microsoft, Tit Meng worked in Sales at NCR, sales at a healthcare startup, and then sales at Oracle, bringing significant experience in vertical industries (healthcare, financial services, and transportation and logistics) that will directly apply to Unify² Communication Enabled Business Process (CEBP) initiatives in the region.

Tit-Meng graduated with Bachelors’ (Honors) Degree in Economics from the National University of Malaysia.
